ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hello I am new
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t be afraid to ask someone to pl you?? Sorry I do not agree with that. Do not ask for pl....do it yourself. Being power leveled makes for bad players with
ygData.messageBody:
Don't be afraid to ask someone to pl you?? Sorry I do not agree with that. Do not ask for pl....do it yourself. Being power leveled makes for bad players with low skills. Do it yourself with groups,etc....
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Charles Clavey
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, April 29, 2002 7:45 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hello I am new

Hey, well i guess i read more than i post, but i
wanted to get this newbie some adivce:
dont be afraid to ask for help.  when i first started,
i was terrified to ask any one for buffs or extra
items, but you should.  also, dont be afraid to ask
anyone to pl you. 
Regards
Charles Clavey
"Sandaris"
--- muaddib_1974 <muaddib1974@...> wrote:
> Hello,
>   How is everyone today? I am new to this club and
> to EverQuest. I am

> David
